page_content:
26Ad space donations 
In 2022, approximately $2.5 million in ad space was pledged via our 
Employee Resource Groups to nonprofit organizations aligned with their 
mission. Recipient organizations include Stop AAPI Hate, The Trevor 
Project, NAACP and Sandy Hook Promise, a nonprofit organization 
supporting programs and policies to prevent individuals from 
committing gun violence.CH2: Local Communities
ESG Report 2022
